    • Constructor Detail

      • Locator

        public Locator(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map,
       java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initiates a new instance of 'Locator'
        Parameters:
        map - Reference to global HashMap to lookup already located locations
        logger - Logger to log all remarkable events
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if map == null.

    • Method Detail

      • locate

        public java.lang.String locate(twitter4j.Place place,
                      twitter4j.GeoLocation geotag,
                      java.lang.String location,
                      java.lang.String timezone)
        Tries to locate a 'tweet', specified by the given parameters
        Parameters:
        place - Twitter-Place-Object
        geotag - Twitter-Geotag-Object
        location - String containing information about the location of a 'tweet'
        timezone - String containing information about the timezone of a 'tweet'
        Returns:
        countrycode if 'Tweet' could be located, "0" otherwise

      • getStatistic

        public int[] getStatistic()
        Returns the statistics for this instance of the 'Locator'
        Returns:
        Content of the single values in the result array: 0: number of requests 1: number of successfully located requests (a countrycode could be returned) 2: number of requests located via place-attribute 3: number of requests located via geotag 4: number of requests located via hashmap 5: number of requests containing place-attribute 6: number of requests containing geotag 7: number of request containing location information
